create.title: Create an account
create.subtitle: Save this private key to manage your anonymity points

login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Enter your previously backed up private key

desktop.title: Make a deposit
desktop.subtitle: Deposit cryptocurrency into poof for secure transactions and anonymous withdrawals later

connectWallet.title: Connect Wallet
connectWallet.subtitle: Connect your wallet to access funds

select.title: Select a currency and amount
select.subtitle: Select a currency and amount to begin your deposit

desktop.title: Make a withdrawal
desktop.subtitle: Withdraw cryptocurrency anonymously with a magic password and wallet address

specify.title: Make a withdrawal
specify.subtitle: Specify a magic password and recipient

desktop.title: Mine AP
desktop.subtitle: Enter your magic password to privately claim AP for your deposit.

desktop.title: Redeem POOF with AP
desktop.subtitle: Enter the amount of AP you'd like to convert to POOF

specify.title: Redeem POOF
specify.subtitle: Enter the amount of AP you'd like to convert to POOF

selectWallet.title: Connect your wallet
selectWallet.description: To deposit cryptocurrency with Poof, you must connect to a wallet with funds.

selectIndex.title: Select Ledger account index
selectIndex.description: Select the Ledger account index you want to connect

airdrop.title: Airdrop
airdrop.subtitle: If your wallet address was used to deposit into Poof, lock CELO for voting, or deposit into Tornado, you may have receieved a vPOOF airdrop. vPOOF can be exchanged for POOF at a 1:1 rate.
